trans-unit.source: You can receive e-mail notifications when a file system is full or when your server Health Check returns an Alarm severity log. To do this, you must :

seg-source.mrk: You can receive e-mail notifications when a file system is full or when your server Health Check returns an Alarm severity log.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez recevoir des notifications par e-mail lorsqu'un système de fichiers est plein ou lorsque le contrôle de santé de votre serveur renvoie un log de sévérité des alarmes.

trans-unit.source: Configure an SMTP mail service on your <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />. See <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configure the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Configure an SMTP mail service on your <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
See <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configure the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Configurer un service de messagerie SMTP sur votre <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Voir <MadCap:xref href="Configure_SMTP_Mail_Service.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configure the SMTP Mail Service</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provide a list of e-mails to which notifications should be sent.

seg-source.mrk: Provide a list of e-mails to which notifications should be sent.

target.mrk: Fournir une liste d'e-mails auxquels les notifications doivent être envoyées.

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can set a filter on recurring alarms for which you no longer wish to receive e-mail.

seg-source.mrk: In addition, you can set a filter on recurring alarms for which you no longer wish to receive e-mail.

target.mrk: En outre, vous pouvez définir un filtre sur les alarmes récurrentes pour lesquelles vous ne souhaitez plus recevoir d'e-mail.

trans-unit.source: Even though the notification is sent only when an Alarm severity level log is returned, the e-mail contains all logs generated by the Health Check, including the severity Warning or OK.

seg-source.mrk: Even though the notification is sent only when an Alarm severity level log is returned, the e-mail contains all logs generated by the Health Check, including the severity Warning or OK.

target.mrk: Même si la notification n'est envoyée que lorsqu'un log du niveau de sévérité d'alarme est renvoyé, l'e-mail contient tous les journaux générés par le bilan de santé, y compris les sévérités de type Avertissement ou OK.

trans-unit.source: Notifications are sent if necessary when the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> starts, and everyday at midnight thereafter

seg-source.mrk: Notifications are sent if necessary when the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> starts, and everyday at midnight thereafter

target.mrk: Des notifications sont envoyées si nécessaire lorsque l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> démarre, puis tous les jours à minuit

trans-unit.source: To enable existing <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents to receive alert notifications

seg-source.mrk: To enable existing <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents to receive alert notifications

target.mrk: Pour permettre aux agents <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> existants de recevoir des notifications d'alerte
Rendez-vous dans la liste des agents.

trans-unit.source: Click on the button above the list of agents to configure the global agents parameters. These parameters apply to new agents and existing agents.

seg-source.mrk: Click on the button above the list of agents to configure the global agents parameters.
These parameters apply to new agents and existing agents.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur le bouton au-dessus de la liste des agents pour configurer les paramètres des agents globaux.
Ces paramètres s'appliquent aux nouveaux agents et aux agents existants.

trans-unit.source: Enable the Send e-mail notifications to users option.

seg-source.mrk: Enable the Send e-mail notifications to users option.

target.mrk: Activez l'option Envoyer des notifications par e-mail aux utilisateurs.

trans-unit.source: To enable specific agents to receive notifications, see <MadCap:xref href="Assigning_email_address_to_agent.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Assign an E-mail Address to the Agent</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: To enable specific agents to receive notifications, see <MadCap:xref href="Assigning_email_address_to_agent.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Assign an E-mail Address to the Agent</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Pour permettre à des agents spécifiques de recevoir des notifications, voir <MadCap:xref href="Assigning_email_address_to_agent.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Assign an E-mail Address to the Agent</MadCap:xref>.
